title: Sarong, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered with couching stitch on plain weave
description: Sarong of woven cotton with brown, blue, cream-white, black, and red stripes. All-over pattern of circles of couched gold in symmetrical arrangement. Couched crosses in borders. Couched gold dots underlaid with red couching.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sarong, 18th–19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered with couching stitch on plain weave. 1961-115-13.
